net.wekeypedia.elements

Class WikiPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mongodb.DBObject, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, org.bson.BSONObject

    public class WikiPage
extends WikiElement
    This class is used to fetch and store the data related to a wikipedia page.
    Author:
    jeremie
    See Also:

      • WikiPage

        public WikiPage(java.lang.String domain,
        java.lang.String title)
        Initialize a newly created WikiPage object using the specified domain and the title of a page of wikipedia.

        title - the title of a page of wikipedia.

      • fetchProp

        public void fetchProp(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Perform a query using the specified parameters and filters the result. The parameters must contain ["action":"query"] and ["prop":???].
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters for the query.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs in the reading the result of the query.

      • fetchInfo

        public void fetchInfo()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Fetch the info of the page. The parameters used are: action = query; prop = info.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs in the reading the result of the query.

      • resolveRedirects

        public void resolveRedirects()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Fetch the api to verified if the page is a redirection page. If the page is a redirection, the field "redirects_to" is initialize with the destination of the redirection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs in the reading the result of the query.

      • fetchCategories

        public void fetchCategories()
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Fetch all the categories of the page. The parameters used are: action = query; prop = categories; clprop = timestamp.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs in the reading the result of the query.

      • fetchRevisions

        public void fetchRevisions()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Fetch all the revisions of the page. The parameters used are: action = query; prop = revisions; rvprop = user|userid|timestamp|size.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs in the reading the result of the query.

      • fetchLinks

        public void fetchLinks()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Fetch all the links of the page. The parameters used are: action = query; prop = links.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs in the reading the result of the query.

      • fetchBacklinks

        public void fetchBacklinks()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Fetch all the backlinks of the page. The parameters used are: action = query; list = backlinks.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs in the reading the result of the query.
